She is a member of the rural association "10 de Septiembre", located in Lechugalito, a town in the Ventanas canton, in the province of Los Rios. There are 21 members in all, most of whom work in farming and livestock.

Isis works in farming to increase her family's finances. She mostly grows corn, and also raises hens in her home, the products of which she sells in the market in Ventanas.

She likes to spend her free time with her family. She asks for a loan to buy urea, seeds and herbicides for farming. Her goal is to improve her financial situation in order to benefit her family. She has challenges ahead of her like owning a comfortable home.

loans.use: to buy urea, seeds, and herbicides for agriculture.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is Aminata from Waterloo Eastern area in Freetown. She is in her late thirties and widowed with six children between the ages of seven and twenty years. Two of her children attend school.

For the past eight years Aminata has sold charcoal and wood. She works nine hours a day, seven days a week. Aminata says that her main challenge is the difficulty faced transporting her wood during the rainy season.

Aminata is applying for a 400,000 SLL loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy additional charcoal and wood. The extra income from this loan will allow her to grow her business and educate her children. In the future she wants to become a palm oil dealer. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy additional charcoal and wood to sell

loans.name: Mony's Group

texts.en:
Mony is 38 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province. She has four dependent children to take care of, one of whom is in school.

For the past twelve years Mony has made and sold snacks, while her husband has earned a living as a tuk-tuk driver. Together they earn approximately 50,000 KHR a day. They save about 20,000 KHR of this a day for future needs.

Mony has taken loans with VisionFund for two cycles and completely paid them back. Now she is leading her two-member group to ask for a 2,400,000 KHR loan. As the leader she is going to use her portion to buy materials to renovate her old house. She hopes this will enable her to have a decent home for her family to live in.

loans.use: To buy materials for renovating her old house

loans.name: Tarek

texts.en:
Tarek is a 50-year-old married man living in a small village in the Bekaa valley of Lebanon. He owns a small shop where he sells shoes for men. His wife is a school teacher, and their combined revenue is barely sufficient to provide for two individuals. Tarek decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan in order to set an aluminum door for his shop in order to expand his business.

He has been working for 30 years in this domain, and is well known in his region with the special prices he provides.

loans.use: to set an aluminum door for his shop in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Alexandra

texts.en: Alexandra is a 31-year-old married mother of one child. She is of Russian origins but is married to a Lebanese man.  She is a doctor who specializes in the gastrointestinal system, and she owns her own clinic. Her husband is also a doctor but specializes in general surgery.  Alexandra and her husband work in a somewhat disadvantaged area, meaning that their revenue is very low relative to their positions.  Alexandra decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan to purchase a new kit for her clinic and enhance her services. As for the future, Alexandra wishes to establish her own hospital, especially with a newborn on the way.

loans.use: to purchase a new kit for her clinic.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 28-year-old single lady. She is employed in a clothing shop for toddlers and children. She is still enrolled at a private university to which she has to pay her tuition fees on top of all her other expenses. 

She decided to contact Al Majmoua to get a loan to pay the university registration fees and to purchase a laptop for her studies. As for the future, Sarah wishes to graduate from college.

loans.use: to pay the university registration fees and to purchase a laptop for her studies.

loans.name: La Phalange De Samarie Group

texts.fr:
Sanon est le coordinateur de son groupe La Phalange de Samarie. Il est marie et il a 2 enfants. Il habite dans la région Trou Du Nord d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Sanon a dirigé son commerce de vente de cosmetiques pendant les 7 dernières années. 

Sanon voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir d'acheter des cosmetiques pour les hommes et les femmes. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son commerce. Sanon dit que ses défis principale est de devenir un plus un grand commercant et Il dit que son but principale c'est d'avoir plus d'argent pour obtenir un plus grand commerce avec l'aide de Dieu.
texts.en: Sanon is the coordinator of La Phalange de Samarie group. He is married and has two children. He lives in the Trou Du Nord region of Haiti where electricity is scarce and water is very limited. Sanon has been running his business selling cosmetics for the past seven years. He wants to use this loan to invest in buying cosmetics for men and women. He hopes that this loan will help him expand his business. Sanon said his main challenge is to become a great trader and he says his main goal is to obtain more money to expand his business with the help of God.

loans.use: buy cosmetics
